properties.short: Stunning 5-Bedroom Home Featuring Contemporary Amenities… Experience a new level of luxury living!
properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.short: Modern 2-Bedroom City Apartment with Balcony and Skyline Views.
properties.description: A stylish two-bedroom apartment located in a modern residential complex, offering open-plan living, a fully fitted contemporary kitchen, and floor-to-ceiling windows that flood the space with natural light. Residents benefit from secure entry, lift access, and proximity to shopping centres, cafes, and public transport links. Ideal for professionals or investors seeking strong rental demand.
properties.location: Union Place, Canary Wharf, London E14

properties.short: Spacious 4-Bedroom Family Home with Private Garden and Garage.
properties.description: This beautifully presented detached family home offers generous living space throughout, including a large reception room, modern kitchen-diner, and a landscaped rear garden perfect for entertaining. Situated in a quiet residential neighbourhood close to reputable schools and green spaces, the property also benefits from off-street parking and a private garage.

properties.short: Elegant 1-Bedroom Apartment in Prime Central Location.
properties.description: An attractive one-bedroom apartment set within a well-maintained building, offering a comfortable living space with modern finishes throughout. The property includes a fitted kitchen, contemporary bathroom, and excellent storage. Located within walking distance of underground stations, restaurants, and cultural attractions, making it ideal for city living.

properties.short: Luxury 5-Bedroom Residence with Landscaped Gardens and Terrace.
properties.description: A premium five-bedroom residence offering exceptional living standards, featuring expansive reception areas, a high-spec kitchen, multiple en-suite bedrooms, and a private outdoor terrace. Located within an exclusive neighbourhood, this home provides both privacy and convenience, with easy access to transport links and prestigious schools.

properties.short: Elegant 4-Bedroom Villa with Private Garden and Pool – Designed for refined modern living.
properties.description: This beautifully designed four-bedroom luxury villa offers generous living spaces filled with natural light. The property features an open-plan living and dining area, a fully fitted modern kitchen, spacious bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, and a private outdoor terrace. Landscaped gardens and a private swimming pool provide the perfect setting for relaxation and entertainment. Located in a peaceful residential neighbourhood, the villa combines privacy, comfort, and premium finishes throughout.

properties.short: Stylish 2-Bedroom City Apartment with Skyline Views and Premium Facilities.
properties.description: Located in the heart of the city, this modern two-bedroom apartment offers a perfect balance of comfort and convenience. The apartment includes a bright living area, a contemporary kitchen, well-proportioned bedrooms, and a private balcony with panoramic city views. Residents enjoy access to premium facilities including a gym, swimming pool, and 24-hour security. Ideal for professionals or investors seeking a high-demand urban property.
